One of the most common places you can get sick is at school. Students often come to school with the cold or flu before they realize they are ill, or because they don't want to miss a test or an event. Since practically every inch of the building is shared by everyone, germs can spread rapidly. The best ways to avoid getting sick at school are maintaining your health at home and avoiding germs at school.
